description:
Asuka Jr.`s father, and a detective at the local police department. While capturing Saint Tail is one of his duties, he normally leaves it to his son and focuses on more serious criminals. He is sometimes seen arresting the ones Saint Tail has stolen from, having investigated their backgrounds.
It was known that he also once fell in love with Saint Venus (Eimi) during his age of pursuing her.
name: Asuka Tomoki
